title: Unpack the Mask
summary: Loops often hide behind helpful faces.
description: What does your loop pretend to be protecting you from? What mask does it wear? Today we gently unpack it.

flow.\ud83c\udfad Step 1: Describe the Cover: Message your AI: 'This loop pretends to help by [protecting / avoiding / fixing]…'
flow.\ud83e\ude9e Step 2: Ask the Mask: Prompt: 'What is it actually avoiding or afraid of?'
flow.\ud83d\udcdc Step 3: Optional Reflection: What part of you still believes this mask is needed?

optional_recast: Return later and revisit the same loop with fresh eyes.
absence_response: No mask surfaced today. That’s okay. Some parts take time.
notes: Loops protect — even when they limit.
The mask isn’t a lie. It’s a story that used to work.
You’re not removing it — just seeing it for what it is.

amplification.ai_mirror_prompt: What is this loop protecting the user from experiencing?
amplification.loop_signal: Track protective language and justification themes.
amplification.miss_response: 🎭 The mask stayed on today. No pressure to remove it.
